pr_title: Ensure CalculateGenotypePosteriors resources have same sequence dictionary as input VCF

timeline.bodyText: Is there any reason why this check is particular to CalculateGenotypePosteriors?  It seems like it could be extracted and used with every List<FeatureInput<VariantContext>> in the GATK.
timeline.author: davidbenjamin

replies.bodyText: Also, do we need to be as strict as isSameDictionary()?  Maybe it's enough just to have the same sequence dictionary when subset to the contigs used for traversal.
replies.author: davidbenjamin

timeline.author: davidbenjamin

timeline.bodyText: The comment suggests the the file name is only half-true.
timeline.author: davidbenjamin

timeline.bodyText: chain this to the constructor: new ArgumentsBuilder().addOutput(out). . .
timeline.author: davidbenjamin

timeline.message:
Ensure CalculateGenotypePosteriors resources have same sequence
dictionary as input
Turn of seq dict validation in test to force replacement

timeline.bodyText: @cmnbroad the changes I made here are catching a contig length mismatch in these tests.  Given that the subsequent test, where the input VCF has no lengths defined in the dictionary, requires turning off validation, I thought that might be acceptable here, but I wanted to check with you as test author.
timeline.author: ldgauthier

replies.bodyText: @ldgauthier Seems fine. It looks like this same test case is duplicated on the next line though and can be removed while you're in there since its redundant.
replies.author: cmnbroad

replies.bodyText: @cmnbroad I hate to delete a test.  Should I add one where we overwrite a valid dictionary with a (matching) valid dictionary?  That seems like what that original test was intending to do, although that's not particularly interesting behavior.
replies.author: ldgauthier

replies.bodyText: @ldgauthier Sure - it seems easy enough to add that. I was mostly just saying that we don't need to have the exact same test case appear in the list twice, which is what we had before, and still have now.
replies.author: cmnbroad

timeline.message:
Add/modify test to overwrite valid dictionary with a different valid
dictionary
